name: WebbyLab
description:
WebbyLab is a company located in Ukraine, that has an extensive experience in development and support of complex software Web-projects, RESTful Web-services and rich Javascript applications. The company developers build architecture of high-loaded Web-projects, provide services regarding information security and testing automation.
We create mail systems, B2B portals, billing systems, bookkeeping online applications, online survey systems and knowledge control systems, different APIs integration. WebbyLab widely uses NodeJS in the most of the projects and actively supports JavaScript community.
